text: Ashley Johnson may refer to: * Ashley Johnson (actress) (born 1983), American actress, voice actress and singer * Ashley Johnson (rugby union) (born 1986), South African rugby union player * Ashley S. Johnson (1857–1925), Protestant minister who founded Johnson University in Tennessee * Ashley Johnson (footballer) (born 1990), American-born Puerto Rican footballer ==See also== * Ashley Johnston (born 1992), Canadian ice hockey player
title: Ashley Johnson
